title: Privacy Policy for ELE
label: Effective Date:
warning: Engline, LLC (hereafter referred to as "we," "our," "us" or “ELE”) is committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share information when you use the ELE mobile application ("App").

chapters.description: By using the App, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not use the App.

subtitles.title: 1.1 Personal Information
subtitles.description: We may collect personal information that you provide to us directly when using the App, including but not limited to:

list.subtext: (if you make purchases through the App)

subtitles.title: 1.2 Usage Data
subtitles.description: We may collect information about how you access and use the App, including:

list.subtext: Model, operating system, unique device identifiers.
IP address, browser type, and version, pages of the App that you visit, time and date of your visit, time spent on those pages, and other diagnostic data.
We may collect and store your device’s location if you provide permission to do so.

subtitles.title: 1.3 User-Generated Content
subtitles.description: The App may allow you to create and upload content such as voice recordings, text inputs, and responses. We may collect and analyze this content to provide feedback and improve the learning experience.

subtitles.title: 1.4 Cookies and Tracking Technologies
subtitles.description: We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our App and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data that may include an anonymous unique identifier.

chapters.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
chapters.description: We use the information we collect in the following ways:

list.text: To Provide and Maintain the App:
list.subtext: Including analyzing how you use the App to improve its functionality.
Customizing the content and features according to your preferences and learning progress.
Sending you updates, newsletters, promotional materials, and other information that may be of interest to you.
Customizing the content and features according to your preferences and learning progress.
Understanding how users interact with the App to improve our services.
Monitoring and analyzing usage and activity trends to ensure the App’s security and integrity.

chapters.title: 3. Sharing Your Information
chapters.description: We may share your information in the following circumstances:

list.subtext: We may employ third-party companies and individuals to facilitate our App, provide the App on our behalf, perform App-related services, or assist us in analyzing how our App is used.
If required by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities (e.g., a court or a government agency).
If we are involved in a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.

chapters.title: 4. Your Rights
chapters.description: You have the following rights concerning your personal information:

list.subtext: You can request that we correct any inaccuracies in your personal information.
You can request that we correct any inaccuracies in your personal information.
You can request that we delete your personal information, subject to certain exceptions.
You can object to the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.
You can request a copy of your personal information in a structured, machine-readable format.

chapters.subdescription: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at admin@eletalk.uz

chapters.title: 5. Security of Your Information
chapters.description: We take the security of your information seriously and use commercially reasonable measures to protect it. However, no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

chapters.title: 6. International Data Transfers
chapters.description: Your information, including personal data, may be transferred to and maintained on computers located outside your state, province, country, or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ from those in your jurisdiction. By using the App, you consent to such transfers.

chapters.title: 7. Children’s Privacy
chapters.description: The App is not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13. If we become aware that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we will delete such information from our systems.

chapters.title: 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
chapters.description: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Effective Date" at the top of this Privacy Policy.
